title: In the Face of Adversity: Giving Up Is Not an Option!
description: In the Face of Giving Up Is Not an Option by Mary M. CaseIn the Face of Giving Up is Not an Option  tells the riveting inspirational story of how a young Jamaican woman survived a life of daunting obstacles and near-death experiences by unleashing her unwavering faith in God. Her faith gave her the power of self-will and determination to beating the odds and transform her life-chances in amazing ways. The first part of the book is set in Jamaica and later chapters take place in Florida and Georgia. Mary Case encourages you to not only give thanks for the big moments in life, but the small moments as well. Based on her experiences, she has"learned how to find happiness in the simple things of life, like listening to music, going for a walk among the trees, or sitting on the beach and listening to the waves crash continuously against the rocks." In spite of the problems one is faced with each day, happiness can be found in even the small pleasures that life offers.The main theme in the story is "Never Give Up."  In the words of the author, giving up should never be an option! Even though adversity, or misfortune, may strike unexpectedly, all is not lost if you still have life! Faith, hope, resilience, motivation and perseverance can help you overcome seemingly insurmountable challenges. By overcoming obstacles, you too can be empowered to reap the benefits of a relaxed, contented life.Mary's love of writing has prompted her to share her experiences, hoping that it will be an inspiration to others who take the time to read her story.
author: Mary M Case
